sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './post-card.css'; const PostsCard = ({ tour }) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews } = tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.rating, 0) const avgRating = totalRating === 0 ? '' : totalRating === 1 ? totalRating : totalRating /reviews?.length; return (
{ featured && Featured Post }
{ city } { avgRating } ({ reviews.length })
{ title }
${ price }/per person
) } export default PostsCard
